LanguageData.IndianGiantSquirrel.label: indian giant squirrel
LanguageData.IndianGiantSquirrel.description: The Indian giant squirrel is a large squirrel that lives in the forests and woodlands of India. Squirrels are distinguished by their bushy tails, which they use as umbrellas in bad weather.
LanguageData.IndianGiantSquirrel.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.IndianGiantSquirrel.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.IndianGiantSquirrel.tools.3.label: head
